Gallery.Name: Basic Diagram
Gallery.Description: Contains 2-D geometric shapes, 3-D geometric shapes and highlight style shapes for functional decomposition, hierarchical, data structure, data flow block, and data block diagrams.

Templates.Name: Blank Drawing
Templates.Description: Create a blank document.

Templates.Name: Arrows
Templates.Description: Shows the required order of tasks in a project or process, the best schedule for the entire project, and potential scheduling and resource problems and their solutions.

Templates.Name: Block Diagram
Templates.Description: Contains 2-D geometric shapes and directional lines for feedback loops and for functional docomposition, hierarchical, data structure, data flow block, and data block diagrams.

Templates.Name: Block Diagram (3D)
Templates.Description: Contains 3-D shapes and directional lines for feedback loops and annotated functional decomposition, data structre, hierarchical, signal flow, and data flow block diagrams.

Templates.Name: Circle-Spoke Diagram
Templates.Description: Illustrate that every spoke is equal in value.

Templates.Name: Circular Diagram
Templates.Description: Contains chart and graph shapes for financial and sales reports, profit and loss statements, budgets, statistical analyses, accounting tasks, market projections, and annual reports.

Templates.Name: Highlight Shapes
Templates.Description: Contains highlight style shapes for flowcharts, organizational charts, block diagrams.

Templates.Name: Lists
Templates.Description: Used to show non-sequential or grouped blocks of information. Maximizes both horizontal and vertical display space for shapes.

Templates.Name: Presentation
Templates.Description: Shows the required order of tasks in a project or process, the best schedule for the entire project, and potential scheduling and resource problems and their solutions.

Templates.Name: Pyramid Chart
Templates.Description: Show proportional, interconnected, or hierarchical relationships with the largest component on the bottom and narrowing up.

Templates.Name: Timeline
Templates.Description: Shows the required order of tasks in a project or process, the best schedule for the entire project, and potential scheduling and resource problems and their solutions.

Templates.Name: Venn Diagram
Templates.Description: Show all possible logical relations between a finite collection of sets.

Gallery.Name: Business Diagram
Gallery.Description: Create audit diagram, workflow, mind maps, cause-and-effect diagram, data flow diagram, EPC, process, list, chart and Fault Tree diagrams.

Templates.Name: Audit Diagram
Templates.Description: Create auditing diagrams for accounting, financial management, fiscal information tracking, money management, deciscon flowcharts, and financial inventories. Document 6 Sigma and ISO 9000 processes.

Templates.Name: Business Matrix
Templates.Description: Contains chart and graph shapes for SWOT matrix, position matrix, ansoff matrix and growth matrix.

Templates.Name: Cause and Effect (Fishbone)
Templates.Description: Create cause-and-effect diagrams (also known as fishbone or Ishikawa diagrams) to systematically review factors that affect or contribute to a given situation. Document 6 Sigma and ISO 9000 processes.

Templates.Name: EPC
Templates.Description: Create Event-driven Process Chain (EPC)diagrams to document business processes. Document SAP processes.

Templates.Name: Enterprise Architecture
Templates.Description: Create Enterprise Architecture diagrams to determine how an organization can effectively achieve its current and future objectives.

Templates.Name: Fault Tree Analysis
Templates.Description: Create Fault Tree diagrams to document business processes. Document 6 Sigma and ISO 9000 processes.

Templates.Name: Five Forces Chart
Templates.Description: Porter's 5 Forces help analyze everything from the intensity of competition to the profitability and attractiveness of an industry.

Templates.Name: Marketing Charts and Diagrams
Templates.Description: Use for process diagramming, benchmarking, simulation, path routing, resource or 'what-if' analyses, deployment charts, targets, sales pyramids, activity-based costing, and task managment.

Templates.Name: PEST Chart
Templates.Description: PEST analysis stands for Political, Economic, Social, and Technological analysis and describes a framework of macro-environmental factors.

Templates.Name: Process Steps
Templates.Description: Use to show sequence of actions or dependence of several concepts. Maximizes both horizontal and vertical display space for shapes.

Templates.Name: Six Sigma Matrix
Templates.Description: Create a six sigma house of quality chart, prioritization matrix, involvement matrix and feature comparison chart.

Templates.Name: TQM
Templates.Description: Create cause and effect, top down and cross-functional process flow diagrams for business process re-engineering, Total Quality Management(TQM), and continuous improvement. Document 6 Sigma and ISO 9000 processes.

Templates.Name: Value Chain
Templates.Description: Representation of the various processes that are involved in producing services, starting with raw materials and ending with the delivered product.

Templates.Name: Value Stream Mapping
Templates.Description: Create value stream maps to illustrate the flow of material and information in a Lean manufacturing process.

Gallery.Name: Database
Gallery.Description: Contains special shapes and setting for creating entity relationship diagrams, Chen ERD, database model diagram, Martin ERD, ORM diagram and Express-G.

Templates.Name: Chen ERD
Templates.Description: Contains special shapes and setting for creating entity relationship diagrams based on the Chen ERD notation.

Templates.Name: Database Model Diagram
Templates.Description: Contains special shapes and setting for creating database model diagrams. Supports IDEF1X and relational notations.

Templates.Name: Express-G
Templates.Description: Contains special shapes and setting for creating entity level and schema level diagrams, and product data models using the Express-G notation.

Templates.Name: Martin ERD
Templates.Description: Contains special shapes and setting for creating entity relationship diagrams based on the Martin ERD notation.

Templates.Name: ORM Diagram
Templates.Description: Contains special shapes (objects, constraints, connectors, predicates, and relationships) and settings for creating object-relationship models and static diagrams in object-oriented analysis and design.

Gallery.Name: Engineering
Gallery.Description: Create basic electrical diagram, circuits and logic, industrial control systems and systems.

Templates.Name: Basic Electrical
Templates.Description: Create schematic, one-line, and wiring diagrams and blue prints. Contains shapes for switches, relays, transmission paths, semiconductors, circuits, and tubes.

Templates.Name: Circuits and Logic
Templates.Description: Create annotated circuit and printed circuit board diagrams, integrated circuit schematics, and digital and analog logic designs. Contains terminal, connector, and transmission path shapes.

Templates.Name: Industrial Control Systems
Templates.Description: Create annotated diagrams of industrial power systems. Contains shapes for rotary machines, semiconductors, solid state devices, switches, relays, and transformers.

Templates.Name: Systems
Templates.Description: Create annotated electrical schematics, maintenance and repair diagrams, and utilities infrastructure designs. Contains shapes for static, communications, and solid state devices.

Templates.Name: Process Flow Diagram
Templates.Description: Create process flow diagrams for piping systems, piping supports and liquid transfer systems.

Templates.Name: Piping and Instrumentation Diagram
Templates.Description: Create Piping and instrumentation diagrams for piping systems, piping supports and liquid transfer systems.

Gallery.Name: Flowchart
Gallery.Description: Create flowcharts, bpmn, cross functional flowchart, data flow diagram, IDEF0, SDL diagram and highlight flowchart.

Templates.Name: Basic Flowchart
Templates.Description: Create flowcharts, top-down diagrams, information tracking diagrams, process planning diagrams and structure prediction diagrams.

Templates.Name: Business Process Modeling Notation
Templates.Description: Create a flowchart that follows the Business Process Modeling Notation 1.1 standard.

Templates.Name: Cross Functional Horizontal
Templates.Description: Show the relationship between a business process and the organizational or functional units, such as departments, that are responsible for steps in that process.

Templates.Name: Cross Functional Vertical
Templates.Description: Show the relationship between a business process and the organizational or functional units, such as departments, that are responsible for steps in that process.

Templates.Name: Data Flow Diagram
Templates.Description: Create structured analysis, information flow, process-oriented, data-oriented, and data process diagrams as well as data flowcharts.

Templates.Name: Event Flow Diagram
Templates.Description: Depict the relationship between events and process.

Templates.Name: IDEF Diagram
Templates.Description: Create hierarchical diagrams using IEDF process charting models for model configuration management, need and benefit analyses, requirements definitions, and continuous improvement models.

Templates.Name: Highlight Flowchart
Templates.Description: Create highlight style flowcharts, top-down diagrams, information tracking diagrams, process planning diagrams and structure prediction diagrams.

Templates.Name: Work Flow Diagram
Templates.Description: Create diagrams of information flow, business process automation, business process re-engineering, accounting, management, and huaman resources tasks. Document 6 Sigma and ISO 9000 processes.

Templates.Name: SDL Diagram
Templates.Description: Create object-oriented diagrams for communications and telecommunications systems and networks, using Specification and Description Language (SDL). Based on CCITT specifications.

Templates.Name: Compare and Contract
Templates.Description: Compare and contrast is one of the composition patterns used for developing students' skills on telling the similarities and differences between two objects.

Templates.Name: Grid and Matrix
Templates.Description: The grid and matrix compares items across two axes. Grids are often the best choice for storyboards with lots of information.

Templates.Name: Main Idea and Detail
Templates.Description: A main idea and details chart shows the hierarchical relationship between major concepts and their subordinate elements.

Templates.Name: Sequence Chart
Templates.Description: A sequence chart shows a series of steps or events in the order in which they take place.

Templates.Name: Spider Chart
Templates.Description: A spider chart is a graphical representation of ideas or topics in a radial, non-linear manner.

Templates.Name: Storyboard
Templates.Description: A story map is a study tool that helps students in pre-writing and post-reading activities by outlining the characters, plot, setting, problem and solution.

Templates.Name: T-Chart
Templates.Description: The T chart is used to make comparisons in any content area or genre, such as with books or book characters, scientific phenomena, or social studies events.

Gallery.Name: Industrial Automation
Gallery.Description: Create diagrams in the process industry to show the general or detailed flow of plant processes and equipment.

Templates.Description: Show utility systems such as boiler, cooling towers, fluid heaters and air compressors.

Templates.Name: Environmental P&ID

Templates.Name: Auxillary System P&ID
Templates.Description: Show compressor, lubrication and cooling systems, hydraulic systems, pump scales and other auxiliaries related to major equipment.

Templates.Name: Distribution P&ID
Templates.Description: Show how utilities, chemicals and other non-process streams are distributed through the plant.

Templates.Name: Relationship Matrix

Templates.Name: Relations Diagram
Templates.Description: Create relations diagram to help a group analyze the natural links between different aspects of a complex situation.

Templates.Name: PERT Chart
Templates.Description: Create PERT charts for project or task management, timetables, work breakdown structures, critical path method, project lifecycles, goal setting, schedules and agendas.

Templates.Name: Timeline

Templates.Name: Status Table
Templates.Description: Create status table of your business, team, project, process or technology.

Templates.Name: Decision Tree
Templates.Description: Help make good choices, especially decisions that involve high costs and risks.

Templates.Name: Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
Templates.Description: Show a subdivision of effort required to achieve an objective and help organize and define the total work scope of the project.
